title: Stay Hydrated
description: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily to keep your body hydrated.

title: Exercise Regularly
description: Do at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days of the week.

title: Eat Balanced Meals
description: Include fruits, vegetables, proteins, and whole grains in your diet.

title: Sleep Well
description: Aim for 7-9 hours of sleep every night for optimal health.
